benefits.industry_1: Sabbin abubuwan karfafawa don mahimmanci amma saboda ayyukan ci gaban magunguna marasa amfani.
benefits.industry_2: k za a iya taimaka wa marasa galihu marasa lafiya ba tare da lalata kansu ko waɗancan marasa lafiya ta hanyar kuɗi ba.
benefits.industry_3: Kara fadada taimako ga lafiyar duniya.
benefits.patients_2: magunguna na gaba kan farashi mai araha.
benefits.patients_3: Mafi kyawun damar da za a bai wa marasa lafiya magunguna waɗanda suka fi dacewa da su.
benefits.show_more_1: A halin yanzu an rama masu kirkirar wadanda basu da magunguna wadanda kawai wadatattun bukatunsu suke samu. Asalin bunkasa rayuwa da lafiyar duk bil adama daidai, Asusun Tasirin Lafiya zai iya bayarda kyawawan lada don samar da sabbin magunguna koda wadannan sun cika bukatun mafi yawan marassa lafiya.
benefits.show_more_2: Tsarin kwanan nan yana sa masu ƙirƙirar magunguna su sami duk abin da suke samu daga ƙaruwa. Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya zai samar masu da ƙarin zaɓi na tallata wasu sabbin magunguna waɗanda nasarorinsu ke samu musamman ta hanyar samun nasarorin kiwon lafiya. Rajista don ladan tasiri na kiwon lafiya, irin waɗannan magungunan za a sayar da su ba tare da alamun tallafi ba - ba su da tsadar kuɗin sarrafawa da rarrabawa - a cikin duk gudummawa da kuma a duk ƙasashe masu ƙasƙanci da ƙananan.
benefits.show_more_3: Ku yi tunanin magani da aka samar da shi kusan $ 20sannan aka sayar akan $ 50,000. Irin waɗannan abubuwan alamomin na yau da kullun sun zama ruwan dare a cikin tsarin yanzu, inda kamfanoni dole ne su dogara da alamu don rufe manyan kuɗaɗen gaba don bincike da ci gaba. Irin waɗannan manyan lambobin suna ba wa masu riƙe izini tabbataccen ƙarfin ƙarfafawa don haɓaka tallace-tallace. Wadannan abubuwan ba da gudummawa suna haifar da cin zarafin da yawa waɗanda suke da wuyar dakatarwa; kuma da yawa daga cikin marasa lafiya saboda haka ba sa samun maganin da ya fi dacewa da su. Tare da ladan tasiri na kiwon lafiya ta bambanta ribar yana da nasaba da nasarar warkewa; don haka kamfanoni basa samun komai idan aka sa musu kayan aikin su ga marasa lafiyar da basu amfana da hakan ba
benefits.state_1: tallafi don tabbatar da manufofin Ingantaccen ci-gaba na duniya.
benefits.state_2: da yawa ingantawa a harkar lafiya ..
benefits.state_3: Rage haɗari daga cututtuka daga talakawa
benefits.state_5: Rage nauyin tattalin arziki daga cuta.
benefits.state_6: Yana samun ƙwarewa game da ilimin magunguna wanda ke magance cutar yawan jama'a daga kimantawar cutar kiwon lafiya da ake buƙata.
benefits.state_7: iyar kawance ta Arewa da Kudu don samar da kayayyakin jama'a.
benefits.state_8: Irƙirar sabuwar halitta mai canji a haɓaka sababbin abubuwa
benefits.title: lada

book.hif_book_description: Wannan littafin yana ba da shawarar daidaituwa ga ƙa'idodin data kasance waɗanda ke haɓaka ci gaba da rarraba sababbin magunguna. Ya nuna cewa Asusun Tasirin Lafiya yana da yuwuwu kuma zai samar da fa'idodi mai yawa ga lafiyar jama'a da haɓaka tattalin arziƙin a cikin ɗan ƙaramin rahusa.
book.hif_book_note: Wannan fassarar littafin daga 2008; a mafi girma gyara, tsawon kuma mafi kyau version A halin yanzu a shirye.
book.title: Littafin Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya

faq.heading: Tambayoyi akai-akai
faq.q1: Shin Asusun Tasirin Lafiya zai canza tsarin data kasance masu karfafawa?
faq.q1_answer: A bayyane: a'a. Sakamakon yanzu daga kariyar kariyar mallakar kariyar ta kasance a wurin. Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ya ba masu kirkirar magunguna ƙarin zaɓi na yin rajistar sabon magani sannan kuma suna karɓar lada gwargwadon tasiri na kiwon lafiya.
faq.q2: Ta yaya ake tallafawa Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya?
faq.q2_answer: Za a iya tallafawa Asusun Kula da Lafiya na jihohi, galibigwargwadon yawan kudaden shiga na kasa. Wata hanyar samar da kudade kuwa ita ce haraji na kasa da kasa da za a iya sanyawa a fitar da iskar gas, a ce, ko kuma a wani cikas ga ma'amala ta kasuwanci.
faq.q3: Nawa ne kudin Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ke buƙata?
faq.q3_answer: Don samun damar isa ga yawan adadin samfuran, AsusunTallafawar Kiwon Lafiya yana buƙatar samun kuɗaɗe a ƙalla Euro biliyan 3 ashekara. Tabbas, Hakanan zai iya aiki tare da manyan wuraren ninkaya nashekara-shekara sannan kuma zai iya jawo yawan adadin yawan samfur ɗin.
faq.q4_answer: A bayyane: Ee. Yuro biliyan 3 a kowace shekara kasa da 0.3% na abin da duniya ke bayarwa a halin yanzu game da magunguna. Idan duk ƙasashe suka halarci, to kowannensu zai buƙaci bayar da gudummawa kawai 0.0036% na babban abin da ƙasar ta samu zuwa Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya. Kuma waɗannan gudummawar za a kashe su ta hanyar tanadi mai yawa ta hanyar rage yawan kashe kuɗaɗen magunguna.
faq.q5: Mene ne idan wasu ƙasashe masu arziki ba sa so su ba da gudummawa da fari?
faq.q5_answer: rashinsu kuma yana da wasu sakamako masu illa: magungunan da aka yi rajista tare da Asusun Inshorar Kiwon Lafiya kuma ana iya siye su gwargwadon haɗarin da ke tattare da duk ƙasashe masu ba da gudummawa. Wannan damar zai fi kyau ga kamfanonin harhada magunguna don yin rajista don sabon magani kuma zai ba jihohin da ba su ba da gudummawa ga Asusun Inshorar Kiwon lafiya ba.
faq.q6: Ta yaya Asusun Inshorar Kiwon Lafiya zai bada gudummawa ga ƙirƙirar masu kirkirar magunguna?
faq.q6_answer: Masu kirkirar magunguna na iya yin rijistar kowane sabon samfuri tare da Asusun Kula da Lafiya sannan a sami biyan lada na shekara-shekara wanda aka keɓaɓɓe da nasarorin da aka samu na kiwon lafiya: mafi girman gudummawar kayan samfuri don rage nauyin cutar, mafi girman ladan biyan. Samfurin da aka yi rijista yana da lada a cikin shekarunsa na farko.
faq.q7: Kuma ta yaya ake tantance nasarorin kiwon lafiya?
faq.q7_answer: Ana iya samun nasarorin kiwon lafiya a cikin shekarun rayuwar daidaitaccen daidaita rayuwa (QALYs) kuma ana tantance shi ta tsarin bayanan inganci.
faq.q8: Menene shekaru gyara da aka gyara?
faq.q8_answer: Anyi amfani da tsarin inganta rayuwa mai inganci tsawon shekaru 30. Ayan shekara ɗaya na ingantacciyar rayuwa na iya zama, alal misali, ƙarin shekara guda na cikakken rayuwa mai lafiya wanda mai haƙuri ya samu. Ko kuma zai iya zama riba na shekaru biyu cikin rashin talauci (50%). Ko kuma hakan na iya kasancewa ba za a iya tsawaita rayuwa ba kwata-kwata, sai dai a samu ci gaba a kiwon lafiya kawai - kamar lokacin da magani yake kare wata cuta na shekaru hudu da zai rage lafiyar mara lafiya daga 100% zuwa 75%; wannan ribar lafiya ta sau hudu 25% shima kiris shine adana rayuwar shekara ingantacciya.
faq.q9: Ta yaya ingancin rayuwa ke shafan rarraba ayyukan lada?
faq.q9_answer: Kowace shekara, Asusun Tallafawar Medicare yana lissafin daidaiton rayuwar rayuwar kowane rajista na magani. Akan wadannan kimar, ana rarraba rakodin shekara a tsakanin kayayyakin da aka yiwa rijista. Don haka idan a kowace shekara, wasu magunguna sun cimma 10% na duk nasarorin aikin likita da Asusun Inshorar Lafiya ya yi rijista, to za a ba ku 10% na waccan shekarar.
faq.q10: Shin ka’idar Asusun Inshorar Lafiya na kan takarda ne kawai?
faq.q10_answer: A'a. Tuni akwai wani aikin bincike na shekaru 5 kan auna nasarorin lafiya, gami da aikin fida a Indiya da karɓar tallafin Yuro miliyan biyu daga Kwamitin Binciken Turai. Wannan aikin yana nuna yadda za'a iya tantance tasirin warkewa har ma da yankuna matalautan.
faq.q11: Ta yaya Asusun Inshorar Kiwon Lafiya zai yiwu ta hanyar siyasa?
faq.q11_answer: Muna neman goyon baya ga aikin matukan jirgi. Manufarta ita ce gwada asalin Asusun Inshorar Kiwon lafiya a kan ƙarami - alal misali, tare da ladar Euro miliyan 100. , don cim ma sakamakon kiwon lafiya a wasu yankuna na duniya. Kwamitin zai zabi hudu daga cikin wadannan shawarwari kuma ya basu shekaru uku don aiwatarwa. A karshen wannan lokacin, za a rarraba ladan da aka samu gwargwadon nasarorin likita.
faq.q12: Waɗanne fasahohin kirki ne waɗanda masu halitta zasu iya amfani da su don gabatar da wannan sabon matukin jirgi?
faq.q12_answer: Muhimmin zaɓi mai mahimmanci zai zama girman da ma'auninabubuwan da ake tsammani na ci gaban kiwon lafiya har ma da damar samarwa da haɗakar talakawa. Masu kirkirar magunguna na iya ba da shawara, misali, don samar da yanayin yanayin zafi ko na yara na ɗayan magungunan su, ko ƙirar sabuwar samfurin takamaiman magani ko ƙaddamar da maganin cututtukan da suka dace da tsaunukan. Makasudin matukin jirgin shine ya nuna cewa za a iya dogaro da nasarorin lafiya kuma a auna su akai-akai. Hakanan zai nuna irin ƙarin tasirinkiwon lafiyar ta hanyar irin waɗannan sabbin abubuwan ƙarfafawa. Muna fatan cewa, tare da taimakon jihohi, tushe da sauran su, ana iya aiwatar da irin wannan babban aikin matukan jirgi.
faq.support_us: Goyi bayan sabon aikin matukan jirgi kuma jin kyauta dontuntuɓar ƙungiyar Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya na:
faq.title: Tambayoyi akai-akai | Tambaya

general.description: ware farashin magunguna daga farashin bincike.
general.title: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya

how.background_1: A halin yanzu, tallafin bincike na magunguna don magunguna ya fito ne daga hauhawar farashin kaya.
how.background_1_answer: Haɓaka sababbin magunguna yana da tsada sosai. Don rufe waɗannan farashin R&D, jihohi suna ba da izinin mallakar shekaru 20. A karkashin kariyar irin wadannan kamfanonin kera na wucin gadi, kamfanonin kera magunguna na iya siyar da sabbin kayayyakin su a farashi mai matukar tsada. Wannan tsarin yana da sakamako masu illa biyu:
how.background_2_answer: A cikin tsarin yanzu, cututtukan da aka tattara a tsakanin talakawa basu da kulawa ga binciken magunguna. Wannan ya faru ne saboda marassa lafiyar marasa ikon iya sayan magunguna masu tsada. Saboda haka ana yin watsi da cututtukan su. Masu kirkirar magunguna sun fi neman magunguna game da asarar gashi fiye da magunguna game da cututtukan da ke haifar da talauci, kamar su dengue, leishmaniasis ko Ebola.
how.background_3: Babban farashi na jinkirta damar zuwa sababbin magunguna:
how.background_3_answer: Mutanen da ba su da talauci ba za su iya samun sabon ƙwayoyi ba. Ko da lokacin da aka haɓaka sababbin ƙwayoyi, misali akan hepatitis C, ana sayar da su koyaushe a farashin kumbura wanda ya fi abin da yawancin masu haƙuri za su iya. Hakanan yana ɗaukar magunguna game da cututtukan duniya kamar cutar kansa.
how.background_4: Asusun Tasirin Lafiya yana samar da tsarin haɗin gwiwa wanda ke ƙarfafa lafiyar duniya.
how.background_4_answer: Tare da Asusun Tasirin Lafiya, kamfanonin samar da magunguna suna samun ƙarin zaɓi wanda, ta hanyar sababbin abubuwan ƙarfafawa, rage waɗannan tasirin biyu masu illa.
how.essence_1: Amfanin kiwon lafiya a matsayin ma'auni....
how.essence_1_answer: Dalilin magunguna shine haɓakawa da kiyaye lafiya. Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya yana daidaita abubuwan tallata kamfanoni don shiga cikin bincike, ci gaba da siyarwa tare da ainihin wannan manufar ta zamantakewar jama'a: yayin da mafi yawan magungunan da aka yiwa rijista  suka tsawwala ko inganta rayuwar dan adam, mafi girman shine ladan da mai kirkirar sa ya samu daga Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya. A cikin wannan kashin, ana kimanta lafiyar mutane baki daya daidai da komai, ko da masu arziki ne ko matalauta.
how.essence_2: Don biyan kuɗin aiki na kamfanonin magunguna.
how.essence_2_answer: Tare da tallafin da jama'a ke bayarwa wanda asusun Tallafin Lafiya na Lafiya yake bayarwa ga magunguna masu rijista, masu kirkirar kirki zasu iya biyan farashin su kuma su samu kudin shiga na gasa Matsakaici. Kamar yadda yake kan tsarin na yanzu, masu kirkirar kirki suna daukar hadari. Bincike na iya haifar da magani mai mahimmanci na warkewa wanda ke taimaka wa marasa lafiya da yawa. Idan kuwa bai samu ba, mai kirkirar mai amfani zai iya samun kadan saboda kokarinsa ko kuma komai.
how.essence_3: ware farashin magani daga farashin R&D.
how.essence_3_answer: Dole ne a sayar da magunguna masu rijista a kan farashin da ba ya wuce farashin kaya da rarrabawa. Irin waɗannan magunguna suna da arha har ma da matalauta marasa lafiya.
how.in_short: Asusun Inshorar Kiwan lafiya a cikin 'yan jimlolin.
how.in_short_1_answer: Tallafin ta hanyar jihohi, tushe na taimako ko haraji na kasa da kasa, Asusun Tasirin Lafiya zai ba masu kirkirar magunguna damar yin rajistar kowane sabon samfurin don biyan ladan shekara.
how.in_short_2: iyakance farashi don tallafawa samun dama:
how.in_short_2_answer: Farashin samfurori masu rijista yana iyakance ne akan farashin samarwa da rarrabawa, sabili da haka mai araha ko da marassa lafiya ne. Farashin magungunan da aka yi wa rijista ya ragu daga farashin R&D.
how.in_short_3: Biyan lada mai gasa gwargwadon aikin:
how.in_short_3_answer: Sakamakon bayar da lada ga masu kirkirar magunguna ya ta'allaka ne kan nasarorin kiwon lafiya na shekara-shekara da suka samu ta hanyar magungunan da suka yi rajista. Idan aka sami irin wannan sabon magani na inganta rayuwar mutum ko ya tsawaita rayuwarsa, to yawan kudin da mai kera ke samu.
how.in_short_intro: Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya yana ba da tsarin haɗin gwiwa don haɓaka sababbin magunguna - musamman waɗanda aka yi niyya ga marassa lafiyar waɗanda ba za su iya biyan magunguna masu tsada ba.
how.title: Yadda yake aiki

intro.benefits_government_heading: Fa'idodi ga Gwamnatoci da Masu Biyan Haraji.
intro.benefits_government_text: Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya zai rage nauyin mutum, zamantakewa da tattalin arziƙin cutar ta hanyar haɓaka ƙimar kashe kuɗaɗen kashe magunguna.
intro.benefits_innovators_text: Asusun Inshorar Lafiya na iya haɓaka gudummawar magunguna ga lafiyar ɗan adam ta hanyar ba shi fa'ida don magance ƙarin wuraren cutar da yawan haƙuri.
intro.benefits_patients_text: Asusun tasiri na kiwon lafiya zai fadada damar samun magunguna, inganta hanyoyin samun magunguna da rage hadarin kurakuran likita.
intro.book_heading: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ya yaba da ka'idodin data gudana wadanda ke haɓaka ci gaba da rarraba sababbin magunguna.
intro.book_text: Karanta a wannan littafin yadda Asirin Tasirin Lafiya ke kasancewa mai yiwuwa kuma zai samar da babban sakamako ga lafiyar jama'a da haɓakar tattalin arziƙin na duniya da ƙarancin kuzari.
intro.donate_text: shirya kasuwannin magunguna tare da bukatun lafiyar mutane. Ba da gudummawa don tallafawa don ba da gudummawarmu
intro.hif_description: Kamar yadda aka tsara a halin yanzu, kasuwannin magunguna suna da asali mara kyau wanda yafi rinjayar talakawa: haɓaka sabbin magunguna ana samun kuɗaɗen kuɗaɗen ta hanyar alamomin da ke ba da izini. Wannan aibi yana haifar da watsi da bincike game da cututtukan da aka tattara a tsakanin talakawa. Yana hana talakawa damar samun magungunan da suka mallaka ko da kuwa za'a iya samar da wadataccen a cikin sauki. Kuma yana ƙarfafa jiyya mafi kyawu tare da magunguna waɗanda ke samun alamun farashi sama da waɗanda suka fi dacewa ga masu haƙuri. Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya zai ƙirƙiri kayan haɗin gwiwa wanda ke rage farashin magunguna daga ƙayyadaddun farashin ƙira kuma zai iya rufe ƙarshen ta hanyar sakamako mai tasiri na kiwon lafiya.
intro.hif_tagline: ware farashin magunguna daga farashin bincike.
intro.how_text: Ta yaya Asusun Tasirin Kiwon Lafiya ya tabbatar da cewa bincike mai inganci na iya wadatar da tattalin arziki?
intro.pilot_heading: Muhimmin mataki na farko shine Pilot Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya.
intro.pilot_read_pilot: Binciko Matukin Jirgin Sama na Asusun Lafiya
intro.pilot_text: An karɓi ƙaramin binciken bincike azaman aikin shekaru biyar wanda zai ba masana masana'antar harhada magunguna damar yin gasa tare da lokacin sakamako mai lada. Za a rarraba kudaden tsakanin kungiyoyin da ke yin la’akari da fa’idodin kiwon lafiya na mutum daya da aka samu ta hanyar gabatar da jiyya ga kasa mai rauni ko kuma kasa mai tasowa.
intro.quote_jami_text: Tare da isasshen kudade, Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya na iya zama ingantacciyar hanyar ƙarfafa saka hannun jari daga ƙanana da manyan kamfanonin samar da magunguna don magance bukatun jama'ar da ke fama da ƙarancin shiga. Wannan zai iya daidaita manufofin kasuwanci tare da burin zamantakewa na rage wuce haddi da mace-mace. Zai iya tallafawa kamfanoni, ciki har da Janssen, a cikin ƙoƙarinsu na haɓaka samfurori masu tasowa a cikin gasa, tsarin tushen kasuwa wanda ke ba da sakamakon.
intro.quote_jayasree_name: Dokta Jayasree K. Iyer, Babban Darakta, Samun Gidauniyar Magunguna
intro.quote_jayasree_text: Asusun Samun Magunguna ya himmatu don inganta damar yin amfani da magungunan ceton rai ga mutanen da ke zaune a ƙasashe masu ƙasƙanci da masu matsakaici. Ta hanyar kwarewa da albarkatu, bangaren harhada magunguna na da muhimmiyar rawa wajen cimma wannan. Manufar Gidauniyar Samun Magunguna ita ce ta ƙarfafa ɓangaren magunguna don yin ƙari. Mun yarda a cikin tsarin Asusun Kula da Tasirin Lafiya wata dama ce ta zaburar da kamfanonin harhada magunguna don kara samun damar samfuran su, don sa hannun jari a bincike kan cututtukan da suka fi shafar mutanen da suka fi fama da talauci a duniya da kuma samun yaduwar yaduwa. Muna tallafawa manufofin da aka tsara da kuma burin matukin jirgi na Asusun Tasirin Lafiya
intro.quote_norway_text: Ya kamata a kafa Asusun Inshorar Lafiya na Duniya (HIF) azaman kari don kariyar da ake samu ta haƙƙin haƙƙi. Ta hanyar kamfanonin inshorar lafiya kamfanin na iya yin rajista don magunguna da son rai kuma sun himmatu wajen samar da tallafin aƙalla sama da shekaru 10 daga Asusun bisa la’akari da mahimmancin lafiyar magunguna. Wannan yana ba wa kamfanoni ƙarfin gwiwa don haɓaka magunguna ga waɗanda ke da mafi yawan bukatun kiwon lafiya kuma ba kawai waɗanda ke da madafan iko na siye ba.
intro.quote_tom_text: shi shirin Asusun Inshorar Lafiya yana da kirkira da kan lokaci. Akwai bayyananniyar buƙata don ƙarfafawa don ƙirƙirar magunguna tare da babban tasiri na lafiyar duniya da tabbatar da yaduwar su da wadatar su. Ya kamata ya kasance hanyar tsarin kasuwa, wanda baya buƙatar canje-canje iri-iri ga dokokin ƙasa da ƙasa, kuma yakamata a maraba da masu ba da gudummawa da mahalarta masana'antu.
intro.step_01: Asusun Inshorar Kiwan lafiya na rarrabawa kowace shekara ajali na lada wanda jihar ke bayarwa, haraji na duniya da / ko kuma agaji.
intro.step_02: Masu kera magunguna suna yin rijistar sabbin kayayyaki tare da Asusun Inshorar Kiwon lafiya - wanda galibi ba a bunkasa ba - don haka ya yi alkawarin sayar da su kan farashi mai sauki sama da masana'anta da rarrabawa.
intro.step_03: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ya kimanta magungunan da aka yi wa rajista da kuma matakan yadda za su kara tsawon rayuwa da inganta lafiya. Yana ba da fa'idodin lafiyar lafiyar da aka samu tare da su.
intro.step_04: aboda ana sayar da magunguna tare da rajista tare da Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya ba tare da hauhawar farashin ba, suna iya samar da sakamako mai amfani na lafiya koda a cikin talakawa. Asashe masu ƙarfi waɗanda ke ba da gudummawa ga Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya suna jin daɗin ƙananan farashi ɗaya. Haka kuma, duk marasa lafiya suna amfana yayin da aka biya masu kirkirar kirki bawai don siyar da irin waɗannan magunguna ba amma gwargwadon fa'idodin warkewa.
intro.step_05: Ba za mu iya yi ba tare da taimakonka! Muna fatan za ku yi aiki tare da mu don canzawa da aiwatar da Tsarin Inshorar Kiwon Lafiya don sababbin magunguna su iya yin tasiri sosai....
intro.what_text: Asusun Tallafawar Kiwon Lafiya yana ba da ingantaccen tsarin biyan kuɗi don aiwatarwa wanda ke ba da sabbin magunguna dangane da ainihin tasirin kiwon lafiya.
intro.why_text: Yawancin cututtukan da rashin mutuwa a duniya suna haifar da talauci - talakawa ba su iya wadatar magunguna daidai ba..
intro.quote_peter_text: Asusun Tasirin Kiwon Lafiya zai zama muhimmin mataki don ɗaukar nauyin kiwon lafiya na duniya mai araha, wanda daidai shine babban fifiko na WHO, da kuma cimma burin ci gaba mai dorewa na uku.
intro.quote_karl_text: Asusun Tasirin Lafiya yana ɗaya daga cikin shawarwarin da za a iya la'akari da su ɗari bisa ɗari na sababbin abubuwa game da tambaya: Ta yaya za mu magance matsalar cewa muna da irin wannan duniya mai wadata, amma duk da haka a cikin ƙasashe masu talauci mutane ba su da magunguna? A ganina, wannan shine mafi kyawun misali na ɗabi'ar aiki da na sani. Anan, an haɗa ka'idar ɗa'a tare da ilimin tattalin arziki kuma ana amfani da ita ga ainihin matsala, kuma ba za ku iya yin abin da ya fi haka ba.
intro.quote_iqwig_text: A taƙaice, abin da ake buƙata na Asusun Tasirin Lafiya don tantance fa'idodin kiwon lafiya tabbas mai yuwuwa ne a cikin kuɗi mai ma'ana kuma ainihin abin da IQWiG da sauran hukumomin HTA suke yi (misali HAS a Faransa ko NICE a Ingila da Wales) a kullun. .

news.heading: Labaran kwanan nan
news.title: Labaran Asusun Tallafi na Kiwon Lafiya

problem.p1: Cututtukan da talakawa ke fama da shi ba makasudin kashe kudade kan kamfanonin magunguna ba, wanda ke samun fa'ida sosai daga magungunan da ke warkar da cututtukan mawadata. Akwai 'yan kaɗan ko babu ingantaccen zaɓin magani ga cututtukan da ke kama da zazzabin cizon sauro kamar malaria, tarin fuka, schistosomiasis, leishmaniasis, dengue ko Ebola, kodayake waɗannan cututtukan suna shafar miliyoyin.
problem.p2: ana sayar da sabbin magunguna a farashin da yawancin mutane ba sa iyawa. An bayyana wannan matsala saboda farashin masana'antu na yanzu yana da ƙasa ƙasa. Firdausi na iya cajin abubuwa da yawa saboda dukiyar su ta kare su daga gasa. Samun kamfanonin da za su iya yin caji mai mahimmanci ga sababbin magunguna galibi yana da hujja ta ƙarfafa irin waɗannan kamfanoni don ɗaukar manyan haɗari da tsadar ci gaban magunguna. Koyaya, yana da wuya a yarda cewa mutane da yawa suna wahala da mutuwa saboda rashin wadatattun magunguna don samfuran masu arha.
problem.p3: Muna buƙatar ingantacciyar hanyar biyan kuɗi don kerawa, wanda zai iya samar da ingantacciyar hanyar magance cututtukan tsakanin talakawa da rage farashin sabbin magunguna daga iyakance bincike da farashin ci gaba.
problem.title: Matsalar

publications.heading: Bugawa
publications.hif_factsheet: Takardar gaskiya game da Tasirin Tasirin Lafiya
publications.hif_graphic: Asusun Tasirin Lafiya a shafi na 1
publications.hif_pilot_proposal: Tsarin gwajin Asusun Tallafi na Kiwon Lafiya
publications.hif_pilot_proposal_description: Wannan littafin ya fito da hujjoji kuma ya tabbatar da Asusun Lafiya Jari da matukin jirgin da aka gabatar, tare da bayyana tsari da sharuddan matukin jirgin da kuma bangarorin da abin ya shafa.
publications.hif_summaries_description: Wannan takaddar ta samar da taƙaitaccen shafi mai shafi biyu na Shirin inshorar Kiwon Lafiya da kuma burinsa. Ya yi bayanin yadda Tsarin Inshorar Lafiya ke aiki ga marasa lafiya, kamfanonin harhada magunguna, da masu biyan haraji. Hakanan yana shimfida wata hanya ta fahimta
publications.title: Labaran Tallafin Lafiya Jari Lafiya

team.about_IGH: Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya Lafiya kungiya ce mai zaman kanta a Amurka da niyyar inganta shirin {intl_HIP}. Muna maraba da {intl_volunteers} don kasancewa tare da mu a wannan muhimmin aikin.
team.about_IGH_more: Idan kuna sha'awar shiga ko tallafawa Tallafin Lafiya na Duniya, da fatan za a rubuto mana ta {intl_email} ko kuma la'akari da yin {intl_donation}.
team.Aidan Hollis_long: Aidan Hollis farfesa ne a fannin tattalin arziki a Jami'ar Calgary, ya kuma taba aiki a bankin kasuwanci a Turai da Asiya, har ma da na gwamnati. Yana da alhakin jagorancin Incentives for Global Health (IGH), tare da haɗin gwiwar ƙungiyar zartarwa. Ya haɗu da IGH kuma ya haɗu da Tsarin Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya.
team.Amartya Sen: Farfesa a fannin tattalin arziki da falsafa, Jami’ar Harvard; Wanda ya lashe kyautar Nobel a fannin tattalin arziki.
team.Baroness Onora O'Neill: Memba na gidan UK Iyayengiji; tsohon shugaban Kwalejin Burtaniya
team.Boris Yakubchik: Mai kula da gidan yanar gizo
team.Boris Yakubchik_long: Boris Yakubchik shine mai haɓakar yanar gizo wanda ke da alhakin kula da gidan yanar gizo na yau.
team.Carl F. Nathan: Shugaban sashen nazarin halittu da kuma rigakafi a Jami'ar Cornell
team.Christopher Murray: Daraktan Cibiyar, Cibiyar Kula da Lafiya da Nazari (IHME).
team.Daniele Botti_long: Daniele Botti kwararre ne Farfesa a Sashen ilimin Falsafa da Kimiyyar Siyasa a Jami'ar Quinnipiac, kuma mamba a shirin Adalci na Duniya a Jami'ar Yale. Ya yi karatun Laurea, summa cum laude, a adabi da Falsafa daga Jami'ar Milan (Italiya), sannan yana da Digirin Digirgir a Tarihi daga Jami'ar Eastern Piedmont (Vercelli, Italiya). Ya yi rubuce-rubuce sosai game da tarihin ra'ayoyi a cikin mujallu na bita-da-ruwa.
team.Dorairaj Prabhakaran: Babban Daraktan Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka ta Amurka
team.Felicitas Holzer_long: Felicitas Holzer abokin bincike ne a Shirin Kimiyya da Cututtukan halittu a FLACSO Argentina kuma memba ne na Cibiyar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta Cibiyar Kula da Lafiya ta Duniya. Tana da PhD daga Jami’ar Sorbonne a Paris. Kalmomin ta sun mayar da hankali kan ingantaccen rabawa a cikin binciken lafiya. Tana iya Turanci, Faransanci, Jamusanci da Spanish.
team.Glorianna Tillemann-Dick: Kwararre kan Kwararru, Hadin gwiwar Masu Rinjayen Amurka
team.Glorianna Tillemann-Dick_long: Glorianna ta jagoranci haɗin gwiwar masu ruwa da tsaki na Amurka don IGH. A baya, ta rike mukamai a Gidauniyar New America da kuma Mongolian National University of Medical Sciences. Glorianna ƙwararre ce a cikin fassara ra'ayoyi masu rikitarwa a ɓangarorin jama'a da na masu zaman kansu don sauƙaƙe canjin zamantakewar jama'a. Ta kammala karatun digiri ne a Jami'ar Yale.
team.Gustav Nossal: Binciken masanin halitta; Ostiraliya na shekara ta 2000.
team.Harvey Rubin: Farfesa na Medicine a Jami'ar Pennsylvania
team.heading: Tallafin Lafiya na Duniya
team.Heidemarie Wieczorek-Zeul: tsohon Ministan Tarayyar Jamus na tattalin arziki don Haɗin kai da Haɓaka.
team.James Orbinski: Farfesa kuma darekta na Cibiyar Dahdaleh na Cibiyar Nazarin Kiwon Lafiya na Duniya a Jami'ar York; tsohon Shugaban kasa da kasa na Médecins Sans Frontières; co-kafa na Magungunan Magunguna na Tsarin Cututtuka (DNDi); co-kafa na Dignitas International.
team.Jami Taylor_long: Jami Taylor is a recognized expert in innovative financing for pharmaceutical research, development, access and delivery.
team.Jan Rosier: farfesa na Kasuwancin Kasuwancin Kasuwanci na Kwalejin Kimiyya ta Jami'a; Tsohon Mataimakin Shugaban Kasa na Magunguna a Janssen
team.Joshua Salomon: Mataimakin Farfesa a Harvard School of Public Health
team.Judith Whitworth: tsohon Darekta na John Curtin School of Medical Research a ANU; tsohon Shugaban Kwamitin Ba da Shawara kan Lafiya ta Duniya game da Binciken Kiwon lafiya.
team.Karin Roth: tsohon memban majalisar dokokin kasar Jamus kuma tsohon mai magana da yawun kungiyar SPD a cikin Kwamitin Gudanarwa kan Kiwon Lafiya a Kasashe Masu tasowa.
team.Kenneth J. Arrow: Farfesa a fannin tattalin arziki da Bincike na Ayyuka, Jami'ar Stanford; Wanda ya lashe kyautar Nobel a fannin tattalin arziki.
team.Maria Ginevra Cattaneo_long: Maria Ginevra lauya ce a Milano kuma tana aiki kan dokar ƙungiyoyin jama'a da kasuwanci, musamman kan dokar mallakar ilimi. Ta kammala digirin digirinta na Dokoki da Fasaha a Jami'ar Bologna tare da yin rubuce-rubuce kan takaddar mallakar fasaha da dokar kasa da kasa (haƙƙin ɗan Adam da haƙƙin kiwon lafiya - Samun magunguna azaman matsalar adalci ta duniya). An ba ta kyautar abokan karatun bincike kuma ta wallafa takardu masu bincike da yawa. Daga cikin sauran ayyukan, a halin yanzu tana tallafawa Rukunin Kasuwanci na Amurka a Italiya, musamman Workingungiyar Aiki akan Binciken & Harkokin ci gaba. Tana haɓakawa da sarrafa albarkatu da haɗin gwiwa a Turai.
team.Mark V. Pauly: Bendheim Farfesa a Sashen Kula da Kiwon Lafiya a Makarantar Wharton
team.Mary Moran: Babban malamin koyarwa a Makarantar Kiwon Lafiya da Tsirrai ta London
team.Max Alexander Matthey_long: Max Alexander Matthey yana kulawa da sadarwa don IGH, ban da nazarin falsafa, siyasa da tattalin arziki a Jami'ar Witten / Herdecke. Bayan ya yi aiki a matsayin mai taimaka wa likita don ba da taimakon farko na shekaru da yawa, ya yi nazarin tattalin arziki a Jami'ar Münster kuma ya rubuta kasidarsa kan tasirin taimakon ci gaba. An yi wahayi zuwa ga haɗin gwiwarsa tare da Asusun Inshorar Lafiya ya yanzu ya fara aiki a kan wani PhD, wanda zai mayar da hankali kan rarrabuwar kawuna daga yanayin lafiya da tattalin arziki.
team.Mel Spigelman: Shugaban da Shugaba na Kungiyar Hadin gwiwar Duniya don haɓaka magungunan tarin fuka
team.Noam Chomsky: tsohon Farfesa a Cibiyar, Sashen Linguistics & Falsafa, MIT.
team.opportunity_1: da kwarewar gudanarwa a masana'antar harhada magunguna; ko
team.opportunity_2: sami damar ba da gudummawa ga kamfen ɗinmu na kafofin watsa labarun; ko
team.opportunity_4: na iya taimakawa wajen fassara shafin yanar gizon mu (Faransanci, Spanish, Jafananci, Larabci, amma ana buƙatar ƙarin!)
team.opportunity_intro: Muna da wuraren buɗewa don masu sa kai a yanzu. Duk da yake muna iya yin la'akari da yawan masu sa kai tare da kwarewa daban-daban, muna da mahimman abubuwan ga waɗanda :)
team.opportunity_postscript: Mahimmin halaye babban buri ne na haɓaka lafiyar duniya kuma suna shirye don aiki don zama ɓangare na kungiyar. Muna maraba da masu haɗin gwiwa daga duk ƙasashe, kabilu, da ƙari.
team.Özlem Denli_long: Özlem Denli ta karɓi digirinsa na Ph.D a kimiyyar siyasa da dangantakar ƙasa da ƙasa daga Jami'ar Oslo (Norway). Koyarwarta da bincike sun mayar da hankali ne akan falsafar siyasa, tarihin ka'idar siyasa, da tunanin siyasa na zamani, tare da karfafa kan ka'idar sassauƙa da kuma al'adu. Denli ta wallafa kasidu da yawa a Baturke akan koyarwar John Rawls da kuma Thomas Pogge na adalci.
team.Paul Farmer: hugaban Sashen Lafiya na Duniya da na zamantakewa a Makarantar Kiwon Lafiya na Harvard; Hadin gwiwa, Abokan Lafiya.
team.Paul Martin: ashirin da farko Firayim Minista na Kanada.
team.Peggy Tse_long: Peggy Tse mai ba da shawara ne kan harkokin zuba jari a Asusun Ba da Lamuni na Duniya (Bankin Duniya) a nan birnin Beijing. Tana da nauyi na musamman game da dangantakar kasuwanci don IGH, da haɓakawa da sarrafa tsarin cikin gida. Tare da asali a cikin harkar kasuwanci a Goldman Sachs, tana da matukar amsawa ga bukatun abokan cinikin ta.
team.Peter Singer: Ira W. DeCamp Farfesa a fannin nazarin halittu, Jami'ar Princeton.
team.Professor David Haslam: tsohon Shugaban Kwalejin Kula da Lafiya ta Kasa (NICE).
team.Richard Wilder: anar Shawara da Darakta na Harkokin Kasuwanci a Hadin gwiwa game da cututtukan cututtukan cuta.
team.Robert C. Gallo: Daraktan Cibiyar Nazarin cututtukan dan adam a Jami'ar Maryland School of Medicine, mai binciken kwayoyin cutar kanjamau
team.Ruth Faden: Farfesa na ilimin dabi'un halittu kuma wanda ya kafa Cibiyar Berman ta Kwayar halitta, Jami'ar Johns Hopkins.
team.Sachin Chaturvedi_long: Sachin Chaturvedi Babban Darekta ne na Tsarin Bincike da Tsarin Bayanai na ingasashe Masu Rarraba (RIS), wani sabon tunani ne da ke zaune a New Delhi.
team.scientific_advisory_board: Hukumar ba da shawara a cikin kimiyya
team.Sir Michael Rawlins: tsohon Shugaban Hukumar Kula da Lafiya ta Kasa (UK National Institute of Health & Clinical Excellence) (NICE).
team.Sonali Kochhar: Researchwararren Nazarin Clinical & Ciwon Magunguna a PATH
team.Thalia Arawi_long: Dokta Thalia Arawi ita ce Daraktan Kafa na Salim El-Hoss Bioethics da kuma Kwarewar Kwarewa (SHBPP) a Jami'ar Amurka ta Beirut Faculty of Medicine da Cibiyar Kiwon Lafiya. SHBPP shine na farko da kawai Tsarin Halitta na Yanki da Kwarewa a Yankin Larabawa kuma kwanan nan aka sanar dashi a matsayin farkon Cibiyar Hadin gwiwar WHO don Da'a a Yankin Larabawa. Dr. Arawi shine Balarabe na farko da ya kware a ilimin Bioethics. Ita ce kuma Clinical Bioethicist, Clinical Ethics Consultant da Certified Healthcare Mediator. Dokta Arawi shi ne memba na Larabawa na farko da aka nada a cikin kwamitin Associationungiyar ofungiyar ofasa ta Duniya. Dokta Arawi memba ne mai kafa kuma memba na kwamitin Shawara na Kimiyyar Halittu game da Batutuwan Mata a Yankin Larabawa kuma an zabe shi a matsayin Shugaban Kungiyar na Farko. An kuma zaba ta a matsayin babbar abokiyar aiki a gidauniyar ge2p2 ta duniya don ci gaban da'a da kimiyar kimiyya a bincike da samar da shaidu don gudanar da mulki, manufofi da aikace-aikace a ayyukan kare hakkin dan adam, ba da agaji, kiwon lafiya, ilimi, kula da al'adun gargajiya, da ci gaba mai dorewa - yiwa gwamnatoci, hukumomin duniya, kungiyoyin farar hula (csos), kungiyoyin kasuwanci, kwantena da kawance gaba sannan kuma ya zama Babban Dattijo. Ita ma babbar jami'a ce a ge2p2 Cibiyar Bala'i da icsabi'ar ɗan Adam. Dokta Arawi kuma memba ne na kungiyar WHO COVID-19 Ethics Working Group kuma an nada shi a matsayin Jami'in Sadarwa da Bioethics Focal Point ga Firayim Minista. Dr. Arawi kuma memba ne na Kwamitin icsabi'ar Gaggawa na COVID na Ethabi'a Mai Yaɗuwa.
team.Thomas Pogge: Member Board kuma Co-kafa na IGH
team.Thomas Pogge_long: Thomas Pogge farfesa ne na falsafa da al'amuran kasa da kasa a Jami'ar Yale.
team.Tim Gilbert_long: Tim Gilbert shine wanda ya kirkiro Gilberts LLP, kamfanin lauya ne mai ƙwararre kan fannin ilimi.
team.title: Kungiya
team.Vikita Mehta_long: Vikita Mehta yana ba da sanarwa da kafofin watsa labarun a IGH. Ita ce Darakta mai Binciken da Ba da Tallafi ga kungiyar agaji ta Hemoglobal da nufin rage rashin adalci a kula da cututtukan jini a Asiya, sannan kuma tana ci gaba da aiwatar da wasu manufofi na bunkasa manufofin nakasa da rage talaucin lokaci a Kanada da Kenya.
team.Wu Qunhong: Babban jami'in Sciences na Kiwon lafiya a Makarantar Kiwon Lafiya na Harbin
team.Yasmine Bark: Mai kula da yankin, Gabas ta Tsakiya da Arewacin Afirka
team.Yasmine Bark_long: Rijista Magungunan likita tare da MSc a gwajin gwaji daga Jami'ar Oxford da MSc a Kiwon Lafiyar Jama'a, a halin yanzu suna aiki azaman mai ba da shawara kan Kiwon Lafiya da Mashawarcin Magunguna a London, United Kingdom.
team.Zeke Ngcobo: Mai kula da yankin, yankin Saharar Afirka
team.Zeke Ngcobo_long: Zeke marubuci ne ɗan Afirka ta Kudu kuma ɗan kasuwa mai sha'awar kiwon lafiyar jama'a. Tana jagorantar kai tsaye a Yankin Saharar Afirka don Tallafin Kiwon Lafiyar Duniya. Ta sami digiri na biyu a fannin Kiwon Lafiyar Jama'a daga Jami'ar Sahmyook da ke Seoul, Koriya ta Kudu.
team.Abdullah Kaya_long: Abdullah ya yi karatun kimiyyar siyasa da gudanarwar jama'a a Jami'ar Marmara da Paris 1 Panthéon Sorbonne kuma yana da sha'awa ta musamman kan lafiyar jama'a da rashin daidaito a duniya. Tsohon dan wasa ne wanda ke fatan zama malami.
team.Paa Kwasi Sefa-Frimpong: Jagoran Ayyukan Shirin - Yankin Saharan Afirka
team.Paa Kwasi Sefa-Frimpong_long: Paa Kwasi Sefa-Frimpong likita ne wanda ya mai da hankali kan lafiyar jama'a tare da horo mai yawa (BSc (Psychology), Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBCHB) da Master of Public Health digiri. Yana da kwarewa wajen samar da tallafin aikin akan duk wani nau'i na bincike, tattara bayanai, kulawa da kimantawa, da kuma kula da inganci. Yana da kwarewa tare da aiwatar da shirye-shirye da gudanarwa, shawarwarin manufofi, horarwa, da ƙarfafa tsarin kiwon lafiya. Mai karatu mai ƙwazo, Kwasi ya rayu a ƙasashe biyar kuma yana magana da harsuna da yawa.

videos.coming_soon: Za a fitar da ƙarin bidiyo nan ba da jimawa ba.

what.for_more_info_see: Don ƙarin bayani kan ƙudurin farashi, duba
what.how_answer: Za a samar da Asusun Tasirin Lafiya ta jiha da kungiyar ba da agaji. Zai ba masu damar harhada magunguna damar yin rijistar sabon samfurin su don biyan kyaututtukan shekara-shekara.
what.intro: Asusun Tallafawar Lafiya yana da niyyar samar da wani tsari na haɗin kai don haɓaka sababbin magunguna - musamman waɗanda aka yi niyya ga marassa lafiyar waɗanda ba za su iya biyan magunguna masu tsada ba.
what.prices_answer: Lokacin rajista tare da Asusun Inshorar Kiwon Lafiya, farashinsa ya rabu da farashin R&D. Koda marassa lafiyar masu araha zasu iya wadatar da irin wadannan magunguna saboda farashinsu ya takaita ne kan farashin samarwa da rarrabawa. Hanya guda daya tilo don tantance wannan ainihin farashin shine ta hanyar gasa tsakanin masu masana'anta.
what.prices_see_more: Irin wannan gasa na iya ɗaukar nau'ikan gasa mai laushi wanda masana'antun ke gasa wa don buƙatar samarwa samfurin da aka yi rajista a madadin mai rejista. Bayan haka, masana'antun da suka cancanci na iya karɓar lasisi na kyauta don samar da samfuran rajista yayin yin gasa tare da juna a kasuwa. Inda babu ɗayan waɗannan zaɓuɓɓukan da suke aiki don tabbatar da wadatar tattalin arziƙi da araha, Asusun Inshorar Kiwon Lafiya zai tsara farashi mai tsayi bisa lamuran masana'antu da takamaiman aiki.
what.reward_answer: Sakamakon lada da masu kirkirar magunguna suka samu ya dogara ne kawai da nasarorin lafiyar da ake samu na shekara-shekara wanda magungunan da suka yi rajista suka samu. Idan aka sami irin wannan sabon magani na inganta rayuwar mutum ko ya tsawaita rayuwarsa, to yawan kudin zai kasance ga mai kirkirar shi.
what.reward_see_more: Wani muhimmin fasali na Asusun Inshorar Lafiya shine cewa kowace kunshin kowace shekara ana tsara ta gaba. Wannan yana taimaka wa Asusun da masu hannun jarin sa su tafiyar da kasafin su. An rarraba kowace farfajiya gwargwadon yawan nasarorin kiwon lafiya da aka samu ta hanyar rajistar shekara. Don haka kamfanoni suna gasa don inganta lafiyar mutum. Kowane samfurin da aka yi rijista yana ƙarƙashin biyan kuɗi na shekara goma, wanda yayi daidai da tsawon lokacin da kamfanin yake jin daɗin yanzu a ƙarƙashin ikon mallaka. A ƙarshen wannan lokacin sakamako, ana buƙatar mai ƙirƙira don lasisi samfuran da suka yi rajista don samun dama ga jama'a, ba tare da la'akari da kowane lasisi da bai cika ba
what.title: Menene Asusun Kula da Lafiya?
